g.title: KTHW_Proxmox
g.text: Kubernetes the Hard Way — Proxmox Lab (Ubuntu, 10.0.0.22–10.0.0.25)

g.title: comps
g.text: : the front door; all requests go through the API.
: runs controllers to make desired state real.
: picks which node each Pod should run on.
: node agent that starts/monitors Pods on a worker.
: runs containers via CRI for kubelet.
: low-level OCI runtime used by containerd.
: connect Pods to the network (pod-to-pod connectivity).
: CLI you use from jumpbox to talk to the API server.
